Topic Summary: This is an appeal against an Amended Notice of Assessment to Capital Gains Tax for the year 2010 dated 1 December 2015.
Tax Legislation: Section 28 Taxes Consolidation Act 1997; Section 29 Taxes Consolidation Act 1997; Section 31 Taxes Consolidation Act 1997; Section 545 Taxes Consolidation Act 1997; Section 590Taxes Consolidation Act 1997; Section  626 Taxes Consolidation Act 1997;
